description: Try our easy to follow Easter Pancake Art Bilby recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pancake,Seafood free,Soy free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Apr 2020,Easter,Peanut free
name: Easter Pancake Art Bilby Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2-4 drops brown and pink natural food colouring

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour, milk, syrup and eggs in a food processor and process until smooth.

Divide batter evenly among three bowls. Add a few drops of brown food colour to one bowl, a few drops of pink food colour to another, leaving one bowl of batter uncoloured. Transfer each batter mixture into three separate sauce bottles or snap-lock bags with the corners snipped.

Lightly spray a non-stick crepe pan or frying pan with oil and heat over very low heat. Using brown coloured batter mixture, pipe bilby outline onto surface of pan, then pipe a dot for the eye. Leave for 10 seconds to set. Using pink coloured batter mixture, pipe the nose, then highlight feet and ears. Leave for 10 seconds to set. Using plain coloured batter, fill in bilby. Leave for 10 seconds to set, then flip over and cook for 20 seconds to seal. Repeat with remaining batters to make 8 in total. Serve bilby pancakes with fruit and yoghurt.
